translation.en: ♪ I'm no slobby boy ♪ ♪ I never beg for no money ♪ ♪ Fun, fun, funny You'll run from me ♪ ♪ No irony, no ♪
Target approaching.
Stone, how we doing?
translation.de: Zielperson nähert sich. Stone. Wie sieht's aus?

translation.en: [woman] Almost there. Just pulling the encryption key.
translation.de: Fast so weit. Hole noch den Verschlüsselungscode.

translation.en: Four hours in the van, and she's eaten all the crisps.
translation.de: Sie hat alle Chips im Van gefuttert.

translation.en: She's stuck in there with you, so that's comfort eating.
translation.de: Sie ist mit dir dort, das ist Frustessen.

translation.en: Been boring her with your cat chat again?
Cat chat? Actually, Parker, she likes my Barry the Cat stories.
translation.de: -Hast du sie mit Katzenchats angeödet? -Katzenchats? Sie mag Geschichten über Barry die Katze.

translation.en: You like my Barry the Cat stories, right?
Before you know it, you're gonna want one of your own.
translation.de: Bald wirst du selbst eine Katze haben wollen.

translation.en: [inhales sharply] Cats hate me. Sorry, Bailey. Writing a new access code.
translation.de: Katzen hassen mich, Bailey. Ich schreibe einen neuen Zugangscode.

translation.en: I have eyes on Mulvaney. Intel was good.
translation.de: Ich sehe Mulvaney. Die Infos waren gut.

translation.en: [Bailey] I can't believe it.
Europe's most wanted arms dealer seen for the first time in three years.
translation.de: Europas meistgesuchter Waffenhändler nach drei Jahren wieder gesichtet.

translation.en: Adding names and faces to the guest list.
translation.de: Lade Namen und Gesichter auf die Gästeliste.

translation.en: -How long do you need? -[Stone] Nearly there.
Hang on. Something's changed. I can't connect.
translation.de: Warte, es geht nicht, die Verbindung ist weg.

translation.en: The system's offline.
Local access only.
We need a new plan to get you in. What do you mean?
I need direct access to someone who's already on the network.
translation.de: Ich brauche Zugriff auf jemanden im Netzwerk.

translation.en: Head of security. He's at the bar.
[Stone] I could hack his phone, but I'll need to be close to him.
translation.de: Aus der Nähe könnte ich sein Handy hacken.

translation.en: -How close? -Ten feet.
[Parker] Stone, you're not a field agent. Do not get out of the van.
translation.de: Stone, du machst keine Außeneinsätze. Bleib im Van.

translation.en: She can do this.
[woman] It's too dangerous.
Mulvaney's entering now.
Our arms dealer's on the move right now, and I do not wanna lose him.
translation.de: Unser Waffenhändler ist unterwegs, ich bleibe dran.

translation.en: [Bailey] There's no other way. We have to get Mulvaney.
Tell me what you need.
When I'm within ten feet of the head of security, call his phone.
translation.de: Wenn ich in seiner Nähe bin, ruf sein Handy an.

translation.en: Okay, got it.
Hey. Hey, Stone.
You got this.
Thanks, Bailey.
[Parker] I can't tail them any further.
[woman] Stone, listen to me. Waiter to your right.
translation.de: Stone, hör zu. Kellner rechts von dir. Nimm dir ein Glas.

translation.en: Grab a glass of champagne.
translation.de: Kellner rechts von dir. Nimm dir ein Glas.

translation.en: -Thank you. -[woman] Good. Now, drink it.
Liquid courage.
[Parker] He's headed towards the blackjack table.
Do you know how to play?
I was on the chess team.
Oh my God.
-[Parker] Just place a bet. -Welcome.
[Parker] Doesn't matter if you lose.
[dealer] Change set, seven. One hundred.
-[phone ringing] -One hundred, change seven.
[Stone] Okay, I have access.
[dealer] One hundred, sir, in change. Okay. Everybody ready?
He's looking suspicious.
[dealer] Place your bets.
He's headed towards you.
Stone, walk away.
-Walk away. Walk away-- -[music ends]
What are you doing?
I've never played before.
-[dealer] Sixteen. -I'm sorry.
[man] You split your eights.
Splitting your eights. Eighteen.
Eighteen.
Dealer has 17.
-Ah, you win. -You win it.
Maybe I should quit while I'm ahead. -[chuckles] -Thank you.
[woman] Nice job, Stone.
Not bad for your first time out of the van. I think I just lost two years off my life.
translation.de: -Für den ersten Außeneinsatz. -Ich bin um Jahre gealtert.

translation.en: -Did it work? -[Stone] Yeah, I'm in.
[Parker] Where the hell's Mulvaney?
Okay. Got him. Through the kitchen, down the stairs.
translation.de: Hab ihn. Durch die Küche, die Treppe runter.

translation.en: Two heavies working the door.
On our way.
Inserting you into facial recognition.
translation.de: Ihr seid gleich in der Gesichtserkennung.

translation.en: Hello, beautiful.
May I take this seat?
Take it anywhere you like.
[chuckles] Okay.
Maybe later?
[Stone] Okay, you're all set.
I'm almost afraid to see what drew Mulvaney out of his hole.
translation.de: Ich hab fast Angst zu sehen, was Mulvaney angelockt hat.

translation.en: -Lads. -[guard 1] Buona sera.
Okay.
[announcer] We're now taking bets for the next game,
translation.de: Wir nehmen Wetten für das nächste Spiel an,

translation.en: which will begin in two minutes.
[woman] You were right about Mulvaney's gambling habit. He never met a bet he didn't place.
translation.de: -Du hattest recht mit Mulvaneys Zockerei. -Er geht keiner Wette aus dem Weg.

translation.en: [announcer] You must predict the exact order of kills.
translation.de: Erraten Sie die genaue Reihenfolge der Tötungen.

translation.en: [soldier] Copy, Delta Kilo Six. We have reported hostiles…
translation.de: Delta Kilo Six, melden. Feinde gemeldet…

translation.en: Those are military operations.
They're wagering on body count.
[announcer] With a bet of four instant kills, this is a win for player number 46.
translation.de: Mit einer Wette auf vier Tötungen gewinnt Spieler Nummer 46.

translation.en: Betting on blood.
[Bailey] Yang, show me.
Just a bit to your right.
Holy shit.
That's US Navy Seals in real-time.
translation.de: Das sind die US Navy Seals in Echtzeit.

translation.en: And they've cracked military-grade encryption.
Who would have that capability?
Enough tech talk. Target is Mulvaney.
translation.de: Genug Technikgefasel. Das Ziel ist Mulvaney.

translation.en: Okay, Dr. Yang. You have the floor.
Time to give Mulvaney his heart attack.
I'll fire up the ambulance.
Mulvaney's exiting.
Shit.
[Yang] I'll handle this guy. You take Mulvaney.
translation.de: Ich übernehme den hier, du Mulvaney.

translation.en: Mulvaney's on your right. Another service corridor.
translation.de: Mulvaney ist im Servicegang rechts von dir.

translation.en: Stand by to go dark.
[man] Shit.
I've got Mulvaney. Bailey, get us out of here. Fast.
translation.de: Ich habe Mulvaney. Bailey, bring uns hier raus.

translation.en: All right. Okay. All right.
[woman] MI6, right?
You guys really need to work on your subtlety.
You ruined my party.
I should've listened to the voices in my head.
translation.de: Dabei sagte die Stimme in meinem Kopf:

translation.en: "The British are coming. The British are coming."
Comms compromised.
-No shit. -Okay, okay. New plan.
Exfil route Bravo. We have to go dark. Copy that. See you down there.
translation.de: -Rückzug über Route Bravo. Funkstille. -Verstanden. Sehen uns dort.

translation.en: Come on.
Stone! Let's go.
I'm not going anywhere.
We're not done yet.
[Yang] More of Mulvaney's men.
They're heading to the cable car station. Parker's a sitting duck.
translation.de: Sie fahren zur Seilbahnstation. Parker ist exponiert.

translation.en: We need to get down there now.
-Stone! -Go without me. I'll be fine.
translation.de: -Stone! -Fahrt ohne mich! Ich komme schon klar!

translation.en: Stay put. We'll be back.
Jack, this is Nine of Hearts. Urgent forecast required.
translation.de: Jack, hier Herz-Neun. Brauche dringend Prognose.

translation.en: Nine, we have your position and the full overview.
Projecting forward now.
The MI6 team won't get down the mountain in time.
translation.de: Das MI6-Team schafft es nicht vom Berg.

translation.en: The Heart gives a 93 percent chance that Parker will die
translation.de: Parker wird zu 93 % sterben und Mulvaney entkommen,

translation.en: and Mulvaney will get away unless the Charter intervenes.
translation.de: Parker wird zu 93 % sterben und Mulvaney entkommen, wenn die Charta nicht eingreift.

translation.en: I'm gonna need a parachute.
Okay.
Fifty meters away, over the handrail to your right.
translation.de: Über das Geländer 50 m rechts von dir.

translation.en: And don't blow your cover.
On it.
[man] Oi!
The Heart has a chance of success at just 32 percent.
translation.de: Das Herz sagt, du schaffst es zu 32 %.

translation.en: Not helping, Jack.
Whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa.
Um… Stone, big drop coming up.
translation.de: Stone… Es kommt ein tiefer Fall!

translation.en: Big drop.
-How big? -[Jack] The mother of big.
Really, really big.
And we're in the game.
Look, I've got money.
More than you can imagine.
It wouldn't be enough.
Eight minutes out. We're not gonna make it.
translation.de: Noch acht Minuten. Wir schaffen es nicht.

translation.en: Stone, Mulvaney's security are arriving at the cable car station.
translation.de: Mulvaneys Sicherheitsleute sind an der Seilbahnstation.

translation.en: Take the route to your left. You need to pick up the pace.
translation.de: Nehmt die Route links von euch. Ihr müsst schneller fahren.

translation.en: The terrain's too flat, and you're losing altitude.
translation.de: Es ist flach, und du verlierst Höhe.

translation.en: If you cut across to the piste, you can pick up a snow bike.
translation.de: Auf der Piste kannst du ein Snowbike abgreifen.

translation.en: Cables! Cables! Cables! Ca--
Chance of success just plummeted.
Only 'cause you've got no imagination.
Oh, nice. Nice.
[Bailey] Oh, you're joking!
Come on!
He can hold them off without us, right?
translation.de: Er schafft es ohne uns, oder?

translation.en: Hold on!
[Jack] You can get ahead of the bikes at the next corner.
translation.de: Du kannst vor den Bikes landen.

translation.en: [man] Hey. Are you okay?
We meet again.
Must be destiny.
Must be.
[man] Hey.
Hey! Hey!
Stone, watch Bailey and Yang to your right.
translation.de: Bailey und Yang kommen von rechts.

translation.en: The Charter's worked too hard to embed you in MI6.
translation.de: Es war schwer, dich beim MI6 zu integrieren.

translation.en: We cannot risk your cover. Well aware, Jack.
How many in the welcome party?
[Jack] Six of them.
Four pistols, one shotgun, and a sniper
translation.de: Vier Pistolen, ein Gewehr und ein Scharfschütze

translation.en: with a very impressive record.
Get out of the way!
[Jack] Get away from them. Take the path to your right.
translation.de: Entferne dich. Rechts kommt ein Weg.

translation.en: The sniper has opened fire on Parker.
[Stone] Jack, give me a line.
I got the lights.
[Jack] Behind you!
Chance of success to 85%.
Only 85%?
Hardly seems fair.
Uh… two more on your right.
[Stone] Look at that.
Parker and target still very much alive.
translation.de: Parker und Zielperson sind noch am Leben.

translation.en: [exhales] Great. Now, hide the bodies and get out before MI6 sees you.
translation.de: Super. Versteck die Leichen und hau ab, bevor der MI6 dich sieht.

translation.en: Okay.
What's happening?
Where'd they go?
Where'd who go?
Mulvaney had an army of security.
[Parker] Got scared off by the sirens maybe?
No point waiting to find out. Let's just grab him and go.
-Whoa, whoa, whoa! He's foaming. -Shit.
[Bailey] Bastard took cyanide.
[Yang] That's old school.
Shit.
Jesus. He's dead.
Grab a leg. We have to get back up the mountain for Stone.
translation.de: Schnapp dir ein Bein. Wir müssen Stone abholen.

translation.en: All right, genius. Now what?
Genuine dog's breakfast.
The Italians are livid, as are Defense and Number 10.
translation.de: Die Italiener rasen vor Wut, die Regierung auch.

translation.en: -I take full responsibility. -[man] "I." That's your problem, Parker.
translation.de: -Ich übernehme die Verantwortung. -"Ich" ist Ihr Problem, Parker.

translation.en: Mulvaney's dead.
Yang gave the wrong person a heart attack.
translation.de: Yang gab dem falschen Mann die Spritze.

translation.en: And Stone, what the hell were you thinking getting out of the van?
translation.de: Und Stone, was hat Sie geritten, den Van zu verlassen?

translation.en: -That was the only way she could get-- -[man] Put it in the report.
translation.de: -Nur so konnte… -Schreiben Sie's in den Bericht.

translation.en: Paperwork. Excellent. That'll show Mulvaney's lads who's boss.
translation.de: Papierkram. Das wird Mulvaneys Jungs einheizen.

translation.en: [man] Enough.
Mulvaney's gone. And so is any hope of using him as an asset. But now we have a new target.
translation.de: Mulvaney können wir nicht mehr nutzen. Aber wir haben ein neues Ziel.

translation.en: Someone broke through the highest levels of military encryption, including our own.
translation.de: Jemand knackte eine extrem sichere militärische Verschlüsselung.

translation.en: -Did you look into the girl? -[man] The girl?
translation.de: -Haben Sie die Frau überprüft? -Die Frau? Oh ja.

translation.en: Oh, yes. I'm afraid we'll need more than that.
translation.de: -Haben Sie die Frau überprüft? -Die Frau? Oh ja. Aber das reicht nicht.

translation.en: We are trying to trace her, but so far, we have nothing.
translation.de: Wir suchen sie, aber bisher erfolglos.

translation.en: -I'm happy to look-- -[man] We have people for that. Different people.
translation.de: -Ich kann gern… -Dafür haben wir Leute. Diverse Leute.

translation.en: You can all concentrate on your admin. Sandra.
[Parker] Cheers, Sandra.
Thanks, Sandra. Love you, Sandra.
[Bailey] To Stone.
-First time out of the van. -[all] Hey!
-[Bailey] And she didn't blow the op-- -[Yang] No, we did that all on our own.
translation.de: -Und sie hat es nicht versaut. -Nein, das haben wir.

translation.en: Too bad. Been on a good winning streak since Stone joined us.
translation.de: Blöd, denn es lief so gut, seit Stone zu uns kam.

translation.en: Thought you might be our lucky charm. But you did win at blackjack.
translation.de: Du warst kein Glücksbringer, hast aber beim Blackjack gewonnen.

translation.en: And I'm never gambling again or stepping out of the van.
translation.de: Ich werde nie wieder zocken oder den Van verlassen.

translation.en: What'd you do when I left you up there?
translation.de: Was hast du da oben getrieben?

translation.en: [inhales] Hid in the toilets.
-What? You said to stay out of sight. -True.
All right. Leave her alone.
We got more important things to discuss.
Like, the girl.
But let's be honest. We already know who she works for.
translation.de: Es ist ja klar, für wen sie arbeitet.

translation.en: -[sighs] God. -That's right. The Charter.
-Strap yourselves in. -[Yang laughs]
Whatever. I just identified another one of their ops.
translation.de: Ich habe gerade noch einen ihrer Agenten identifiziert.

translation.en: They took out a terror cell who hijacked an oil tanker in the Panama Canal.
translation.de: Sie eliminierten eine Terrorzelle, die einen Öltanker in Panama entführte.

translation.en: Yeah, but who would have that kind of power?
translation.de: Ja, aber wer hat so viel Macht?

translation.en: -I'm doing it again, aren't I? -Yeah.
Okay, fine, mock me.
But it's true.
Ex-intelligence operatives answering only to themselves.
translation.de: Ex-Geheimagenten, die nur sich selbst unterstehen,

translation.en: No national allegiances, no political leanings.
Putting out fires their governments never allowed them to. That's…
translation.de: Sie löschen Brände ohne die Erlaubnis ihrer Regierungen.

translation.en: That's the Charter.
The most highly trained agents
working together to keep peace in a turbulent world.
translation.de: bewahren den Frieden in einer turbulenten Welt.

translation.en: No. That is a Saturday morning cartoon.
translation.de: Nein. Das ist ein Cartoon für Kinder.

translation.en: Nobody knows about the Charter because they don't exist.
translation.de: Niemand kennt die Charta, weil es sie nicht gibt.

translation.en: Pass me the vinegar.
-And this girl. -[laughs]
This girl is part of it, and you know it.
translation.de: Sie steckt mit drin, und das wisst ihr.

translation.en: Okay, don't judge me. I'm gonna go with this for a sec.
translation.de: Ok, sagen wir, ich glaube das alles.

translation.en: -If the Charter are such do-gooders… -Mm.
translation.de: Wenn die Charta so viel Gutes tut,

translation.en: …why'd the girl interrupt our mission?
That's a good question. Yep.
Sorry, Bailey, there is no secret genius organization pulling all the strings.
translation.de: Tut mir leid, Bailey, es gibt keine geniale Geheimorganisation.

translation.en: It's just us, Sandra, and her paperwork.
translation.de: Es gibt nur uns, Sandra und ihren Papierkram.

translation.en: But it was a nice bedtime story. Speaking of which…
Already?
-Jet lag. -Um, there's a one-hour time difference.
Night, guys.
-Night. -Night.
[laughs] Right in the eye.
-I drive with that eye. -Might make you a better driver.
translation.de: Das brauch ich zum Fahren. Mit einem fährst du vielleicht besser.

translation.en: [Yang] Can't make you worse.
translation.de: Mit einem fährst du vielleicht besser.

translation.en: -Kidding. I take it back. -[Parker] No.
Sneaking up on me? A field agent should be ready for anything.
translation.de: -Schleichst du dich an? -Agenten müssen auf alles gefasst sein.

translation.en: You were saying? I never should have told you I swim.
translation.de: Ich hätte dir nicht sagen sollen, dass ich schwimmen gehe.

translation.en: A weak moment. I liked it.
translation.de: Ein kleiner Patzer. Hat mir gefallen.

translation.en: So… the girl.
What news?
No news. We were told not to look. You're a terrible liar.
translation.de: -Keine. Wir sollten sie doch nicht suchen. -Du bist eine schlechte Lügnerin.

translation.en: Look, if we leave it to the pen-pushers at MI6,
translation.de: Wenn wir das den Sesselfurzern beim MI6 überlassen,

translation.en: she'll hack the entire world before we even get a name.
translation.de: wird sie die ganze Welt hacken.

translation.en: I should've gone beyond the mission and brought her in.
Well, your hands were pretty full at the time.
And besides, it wasn't our objective.
translation.de: Außerdem war das nicht unser Auftrag.

translation.en: Why don't you try and live a little? Could be fun.
translation.de: Versuch, ein bisschen zu leben. Macht Spaß.

translation.en: What happened to "Don't get out of the van, Rachel"? Ah.
translation.de: Und was ist mit "Bleib im Van, Rachel"?

translation.en: -This is different. -Hm.
So, rules are rules unless they apply to you.
translation.de: Regeln gelten für alle außer für dich.

translation.en: Why do I feel like you know me better than I know you?
translation.de: Du kennst mich wohl besser als ich dich.

translation.en: Maybe I should listen to one of these dreary podcasts of yours.
translation.de: Ich sollte mir diese öden Podcasts anhören.

translation.en: Bailey got to you, huh?
Mock our music, and I won't tell you my theory.
translation.de: So erfährst du nichts von meiner Theorie.

translation.en: My lips are sealed.
She's new to the scene. Has to be.
translation.de: Sie ist neu in der Szene, sie muss es sein.

translation.en: Otherwise, we would have heard about her.
translation.de: Sonst hätten wir von ihr gehört.

translation.en: To get a guest list like that--
She's working with someone else. A veteran. But who?
translation.de: Sie arbeitet mit einem alten Hasen. Mit wem?

translation.en: We'll make a list. I'll bring snacks.
translation.de: Wir knacken das. Ich hole Snacks.

translation.en: I, uh, I'm sorry. I already have… a brunch date.
translation.de: Tut mir leid, ich bin schon zum Brunch verabredet.

translation.en: Can I come?
Bye, Parker.
[Stone] Ivo? It's been a while.
Nine of Hearts, it's good to see you.
-How's it going? -It's been busy. This way.
translation.de: -Wie läuft's? -Es ist viel los. Hier entlang.

translation.en: The Charter has been dealing with three actionable threats this morning.
translation.de: Die Charta hat heute Morgen drei Bedrohungen bearbeitet.

translation.en: Potential sarin gas attack in Paris.
The Heart predicted the time and location of the attack with 87% certainty.
translation.de: Das Herz hat Ort und Zeit mit 87-prozentiger Sicherheit benannt.

translation.en: Eight of Hearts is on site now.
Six is defusing a potential international incident
in the South China Sea.
And Diamonds team's handling hackers targeting the North American power grid.
translation.de: Und das Karo-Team kümmert sich um Hacker im Stromnetz Nordamerikas.

translation.en: That, um… That's the peacock.
-Hi. -Came with the house.
-[peafowl caws] -[Stone] Hey, Jack. Enjoying your new office?
translation.de: Hey, Jack. Gefällt dir dein neues Büro?

translation.en: We can't all be gallivanting around the Alps.
translation.de: Wir können nicht alle in den Alpen rumalbern.

translation.en: How's King of Hearts? Is she angry?
translation.de: Wie geht es Herz-König? Ist sie wütend?

translation.en: Have you seen her yet?
Well, let's see. You lost control of the situation, target is dead,
translation.de: Also… Die Situation ist euch entglitten. Die Zielperson und sechs Männer sind tot.

translation.en: then you had to kill six men.
translation.de: Die Zielperson und sechs Männer sind tot.

translation.en: What a glorious outcome.
translation.de: Ein glorreicher Erfolg. Victoria-Kreuze für alle.

translation.en: -Victoria Crosses all around. -[Stone] Morning, Nomad.
translation.de: Ein glorreicher Erfolg. Victoria-Kreuze für alle. Morgen, Nomad.

translation.en: Good to see you too. Love what you've done with the place.
translation.de: Schön dich zu sehen. Hast es toll eingerichtet.

translation.en: Is she developing a sense of humor?
-Did you find the girl? -Of course.
She is from Pune in the west of India.
translation.de: Sie kommt aus Pune in Westindien.

translation.en: Orphaned at eight.
[Stone] How'd she learn to program?
Ever heard of Niam Kharche? Billionaire investor, pharmaceuticals.
Had business in Pune. Ran IT workshops for kids in underprivileged communities.
translation.de: Er organisierte in Pune IT-Workshops für unterprivilegierte Kinder.

translation.en: [Stone] He spotted her in one of these programs.
translation.de: In einem davon entdeckte er sie.

translation.en: Yeah. He saw she was a prodigy, took her under his wing, trained her up,
translation.de: Er erkannte ihr Talent und bildete sie aus,

translation.en: and then they had a falling out.
Why? [Nomad] The Heart's better at whats than whys.
And the what is, she split from Kharche and disappeared.
translation.de: Sie trennte sich von Kharche und verschwand.

translation.en: She's 22 now. Not much older than when we met.
translation.de: -Sie ist jetzt 22. -Kaum älter als ich, als wir uns trafen.

translation.en: [Nomad] Yes, but she fell in with a bunch of criminal lowlifes.
translation.de: Ja, aber sie gab sich mit Kriminellen ab.

translation.en: Some people get all the luck.
We think that Keya set up the casino of blood.
translation.de: Wir glauben, Keya hat das Casino des Blutes eröffnet.

translation.en: She knew about Mulvaney's gambling habit and used it to lure him in.
translation.de: Sie kannte Mulvaneys Spielsucht und wollte ihn anlocken.

translation.en: Why?
Mulvaney had become obsessed with a new weapon, a myth.
translation.de: Mulvaney war besessen von einer neuen Waffe, einem Mythos.

translation.en: A quantum computer sophisticated enough to hack into anything, anywhere.
translation.de: Ein hoch entwickelter Quantencomputer, der sich überall einhacken kann.

translation.en: The Heart.
So, where is she now?
The Heart predicts with 96% certainty that Keya is heading to Lisbon for the opening of Club Moritz.
translation.de: Zu 96 % ist sie auf dem Weg nach Lissabon zur Eröffnung des Clubs Moritz.

translation.en: So, we will leak her location to MI6.
translation.de: Wir leaken ihren Standort an den MI6,

translation.en: Then we should have your operation back up and running within 24 hours.
translation.de: dann läuft eure Operation innerhalb von 24 Stunden weiter.

translation.en: It doesn't feel right.
Keya chose to hack into our comms feed on the mountain.
translation.de: Keya hörte uns am Berg bewusst ab.

translation.en: She revealed herself to me, looked me straight in the eye.
translation.de: Sie blickte mir direkt in die Augen.

translation.en: I'm not sure if we should ignore the Heart,
translation.de: Wir sollen also das Herz ignorieren,

translation.en: the closest mankind has to perfect intelligence, because of eye contact in a bar.
translation.de: die fast perfekte Intelligenz, weil es in einer Bar Augenkontakt gab.

translation.en: This might be why you're single, Jack.
Just follow the numbers.
Your mission is Lisbon. And if she's not there?
translation.de: -Du fährst nach Lissabon. -Und wenn sie dort nicht ist?

translation.en: Eat tapas. Just not with your MI6 team.
translation.de: Iss Tapas. Nur nicht mit deinem MI6-Team.

translation.en: So, you're spying on me now.
I'm tracking my asset.
You know what you signed up for. No relationships. No friends.
translation.de: Du kanntest die Bedingungen. Keine Beziehungen. Keine Freunde.

translation.en: No poolside tête-à-tête.
What we do is too important.
translation.de: Was wir tun, ist zu wichtig.

translation.en: When governments fail, the only thing left is the Charter.
translation.de: Wenn Regierungen scheitern, bleibt nur noch die Charta.

translation.en: I'm undercover. This is just part of it.
translation.de: Ich bin undercover. Das gehört dazu.

translation.en: -Everything's under control. -Good.
Keep it that way.
Your target is Dhawan.
Come on, Keya. Take the bait.
translation.de: Komm schon, Keya. Schluck den Köder.

translation.en: Smile.
[Bailey] Hey. We got a lead on hacker girl. We're going to Lisbon.
translation.de: Wir sind der Hackerin auf der Spur. Wir fahren nach Lissabon.

translation.en: Better call the cat sitter.
Oh no, no. Barry's all right. He's--
I told him, no parties.
Okay. Sweet dreams.
Wheels up at eight.
Got it.
-Night, Bailey. -Night.
[Bailey laughs] What about this?
[Parker] Ah Jesus. Just when we thought it couldn't get worse.
translation.de: Gerade als wir dachten, schlimmer geht es nicht mehr.

translation.en: -[Bailey] Are you singing? -[Parker] I'm clearing my throat.
translation.de: -Parker, singst du? -Nein. Ich räuspere mich nur.

translation.en: Tune.
-[Stone] Look at that. -[Parker] No.
Voice of an angel.
♪ I want to be with you everywhere ♪ ♪ Oh, I ♪
Bailey, you should meet my gran. She has the same taste in music, and you have the same hair.
translation.de: Du hast denselben Musikgeschmack und die gleiche Frisur wie meine Oma.

translation.en: It's my van, my tunes.
Yeah, that's what she says.
-[Bailey] Oh, sorry. -[Parker] Whoa.
translation.de: Oh, tut mir leid. Das geht noch etwas härter. Meine Zähne sind noch ganz.

translation.en: Little harder next time. I didn't quite crack a tooth.
translation.de: Das geht noch etwas härter. Meine Zähne sind noch ganz.

translation.en: [Yang] You okay back there?
Yeah, I'm fine. I'm just, uh…
translation.de: Ja, alles gut. Mir ist nur…

translation.en: -[Yang] Carsick. -Mm.
-[Parker] It's Bailey's music. -[laughing]
Come on, swap seats with me.
-What? No, no, no. It's fine. -Come on. No, it's fine. Move.
-Okay. -[seat belt unlocks]
-[Stone] Jesus! -[Bailey] Seatbelt.
[Yang] Bailey! [Parker] Aren't you supposed to be an elite driver?
Sorry.
-[Bailey] Okay? -Yeah.
[Yang] How long till the club opens?
[Bailey] We head out in a couple of hours.
translation.de: Wir gehen in zwei Stunden los.

translation.en: [Bailey] Hey, Stone.
Sent you something. Check it out.
-What is this? -It's for my niece's birthday.
What do you think? Female perspective?
It's very pink. [chuckles softly]
[Yang] Parker, this music is ancient.
translation.de: Parker! Diese Musik ist uralt. Wie alt bist du? Hundert?

translation.en: -What are you, a hundred years old? -It's called culture.
translation.de: Parker! Diese Musik ist uralt. Wie alt bist du? Hundert? Das nennt man Kultur.

translation.en: Yeah. Sorry, Parker, I'm with Yang. Yang!
translation.de: Tut mir leid, ich stimme Yang zu. Yang!

translation.en: [Yang] Yes!
-Woo! -Oh, okay.
[Yang] Now we're talking.
Oh, come on, Bailey. You know you want to.
translation.de: Bailey, du willst das doch auch.

translation.en: Yes, I do.
[Bailey] Stone?
-Oh yeah. -[Bailey] Stone, come on.
[Bailey] You know you want to. Come on.
[Yang] Yeah.
Oh no you don't.
Watch out, you might actually enjoy yourself.
translation.de: Pass auf, sonst amüsierst du dich noch.

translation.en: -She's smiling. -[Yang] Oh yeah!
[man] Six hostiles entering the building…
Nine, I have you.
Six hostiles moving up the stairs. More outside.
translation.de: Sechs Feinde auf der Treppe. Weitere draußen.

translation.en: They'll breach the doorway in four…
three…
two…
one.
[Bailey] Parker.
We're gonna get you out.
Stone, go now!
Nine, the window.
Get out. Now.
Stone, you will die.
Jack, I need your help.
Plotting exit routes… now.
Come on. Parker, come on. Come on!
I'm going back in.
What? No. Saving them is not your mission.
translation.de: Was? Nein. Sie zu retten ist nicht deine Mission.

translation.en: -Get out of there. -Jack, please.
No. At best, you break cover. Most likely, you die.
translation.de: Nein. Du wirst auffliegen oder draufgehen.

translation.en: -Holy shit. -Come on.
Time to go.
There'll be more. Come on.
Van's a no-go. Go, go.
Does that thing ever work?
Yeah, yeah. It works. Just not on every car.
translation.de: Ja, tut es. Aber nicht bei jedem Auto.

translation.en: There. Move!
Stone. Now would be good.
Move over. I've got this.
-Away from the guns, Stone. Away! -Just a second.
Down! Down! Down!
Go! Go, go, go, go!
Okay, Stone. Time to start talking.
translation.de: Ok, Stone. Karten auf den Tisch.

translation.en: You hack, you fight, and you drive. Parker, are you getting this?
translation.de: Du kannst hacken, kämpfen und fahren. Parker, hörst du zu?

translation.en: -Three vehicles. Lots of guns. -Yeah, I can tell by the bullets.
translation.de: -Drei Autos, viele Waffen. -Merke ich an den Kugeln.

translation.en: -Stone! -Sort of in the middle of something.
Brakes, brakes, brakes!
Oh, okay. Okay, you got it.
Yang.
-Got it. -On your three o'clock.
In three, two, one.
Clip's out.
-Are you trying to kill us? -Pretty much the opposite, actually.
Okay. This might be kind of intense.
Oh, this isn't good.
-Stone, they're still coming. -I know.
Hold on.
Well, I can't speak for the others, but I… I think you're ready for the field.
translation.de: Ich persönlich denke, du bist bereit für Außeneinsätze.

translation.en: We need to get off the road and lose this van.
[Yang] Rachel.
Rachel.
Who the hell are you?
It's complicated.
-[sighs] -From where I'm sitting,
translation.de: Es ist kompliziert. Eine junge IT-Agentin hat soeben ein ganzes Killer-Kommando erledigt.

translation.en: a baby agent from IT just took out an entire kill team.
translation.de: Eine junge IT-Agentin hat soeben ein ganzes Killer-Kommando erledigt.

translation.en: -Bailey, what's taking you so long? -Shit.
The Charter? You're the… you're the bloody Charter?
translation.de: Die Charta? Du bist bei der Charta?

translation.en: What, are you trying to bring in Dhawan yourself?
Are you working with her?
[Yang] Answer him.
You owe us that.
We're after her too.
Oh my God.
The Charter's real.
And you're one of them. I wish I could've told you more.
translation.de: -Du gehörst dazu. -Ich hätte euch gern mehr gesagt.

translation.en: But we all want the same thing.
No, we don't.
You're not the only one with a secret.
translation.de: Nicht nur du hast ein Geheimnis.

translation.en: Did they mean something to you?
Oh, come on, Rachel. You're only playing a part, right?
translation.de: Komm schon, Rachel. Du spielst nur eine Rolle, oder?

translation.en: Who are you, Parker? Why don't you ask the Heart?
translation.de: -Wer bist du, Parker? -Warum fragst du nicht das Herz?

translation.en: If you wanted me dead, you would have shot me first.
translation.de: Du hättest mich zuerst erschießen können.

translation.en: [exhales] Still a few things I need to know.
translation.de: Ich muss vorher noch was erfahren.

translation.en: About you, the Charter.
But perhaps most of all,
I was looking forward to a fight.
-[groans] -Talk.
Keya and I learned that the Charter infiltrated MI6.
translation.de: Keya und ich erfuhren, dass die Charta MI6 infiltrierte.

translation.en: I had to flush out who.
At first, I thought it was Yang, but I was so pleased it was you.
translation.de: Erst dachte ich, es wäre Yang, aber ich war froh, dass du es warst.

translation.en: Keya's working for you?
Your hand's shaking.
You barely nicked me. That was the point.
translation.de: -Du hast mich kaum geschnitten. -Das war der Plan.

translation.en: Poison-tipped.
A little basic, I know, but it hits the spot.
translation.de: Etwas trivial, ich weiß. Aber es wirkt.

translation.en: Looks like the paralysis is kicking in.
I spent six years looking for you people, Stone.
translation.de: Ich habe sechs Jahre nach euch gesucht, Stone.

translation.en: Then fate brings you straight to me.
translation.de: Bis das Schicksal dich zu mir führte.

translation.en: You're a very good agent.
But you were so busy letting a machine think for you that you missed me.
translation.de: Aber du hast einer Maschine vertraut und mich übersehen.

translation.en: Right here,
in front of your face…
the whole time.
And Mulvaney?
Well, he was tech-averse like me.
Kept everything up here.
So, Keya and I set up our casino of blood to lure him in.
translation.de: Keya und ich eröffneten also unser Casino des Blutes, um ihn anzulocken.

translation.en: We needed to have a little chat about the Heart.
translation.de: Wir mussten über das Herz reden.

translation.en: All right. Okay, okay, okay.
[Parker] Talk.
Yeah, I--
The Heart is what gives the Charter its power.
translation.de: Das Herz gibt der Charta ihre Macht.

translation.en: It's the most formidable weapon you never knew existed.
translation.de: Es ist die größte Waffe, von der ihr nie etwas wusstet.

translation.en: It can hack into anything, anywhere.
translation.de: Sie kann sich in alles einhacken.

translation.en: Cell phones, power grids, the banks, governments, military, health records.
translation.de: Handys, Stromnetze, Banken, Regierungen, das Militär, Krankenakten.

translation.en: Your secrets.
It knows you better than you know yourself.
translation.de: Es kennt euch besser, als ihr euch kennt.

translation.en: It's determinism.
With access to trillions of data points at once, its modeling is so accurate
translation.de: Es greift auf Billionen Datenpunkte zu und modelliert so genau,

translation.en: it can predict the future.
The Heart is knowledge and power.
translation.de: Das Herz ist Wissen und Macht.

translation.en: It can crash a market or drop a plane out of the sky.
translation.de: Es kann Märkte zerstören und Flugzeuge abstürzen lassen.

translation.en: Who needs to steal a nuclear bomb when you can control them all?
translation.de: Wozu eine Atombombe stehlen, wenn man sie alle kontrollieren kann?

translation.en: If you own the Heart…
you own the world.
Where is it?
Where… is it?
Only a Charter member could tell you.
The poison's a cholinesterase inhibitor.
Cold War paralytic.
My chemist does all the classics.
Like cyanide.
Oh, relax, Rachel.
Killing you is not part of the plan. We need you to deliver a package first.
translation.de: Wir wollen dich nicht töten. Du musst zuerst ein Paket abliefern.

translation.en: -[groans] -I've loved working with you, Rachel.
translation.de: Ich habe gern mit dir gearbeitet.

translation.en: Hand on heart.
[Nomad] Stone?
She's awake. She's awake.
[nurse panting] Hold her here. Hold her down.
Oh shit.
-[grunting] -Take this. Help me. Help me here.
Keep her steady.
Cholinest-- Cholines--
Wait. Get me atropine. Five mils.
It's cholinesterase.
Jack. Jack.
-[Jack] We've been breached. -How?
It's… There's a Trojan in our system delivered wirelessly. Chewing through security like it isn't there.
translation.de: Ein Trojaner ist über Funk reingelangt und frisst sich durch unseren Schutz.

translation.en: Restrict all access.
Nomad, I've tried. No-go. They're trying to access the Heart.
translation.de: -Zugriff einschränken. -Klappt nicht. -Sie greifen auf das Herz zu. -Von wo? Wir haben eine Firewall.

translation.en: [Nomad] From where? We're walled off.
translation.de: -Sie greifen auf das Herz zu. -Von wo? Wir haben eine Firewall.

translation.en: It's a weak wireless signal. It's coming from…
translation.de: Es ist ein schwaches Funksignal. Es kommt aus…

translation.en: inside the building.
[doctor] Quickly. We need to monitor her airway.
-[nurse] Go ahead. -[doctor] Hold her.
Press down.
That didn't do it.
-[Stone breathing heavily] -Stone. What's happened? I need to know what's happened.
translation.de: Stone. Was ist los? Ich muss wissen, was passiert ist.

translation.en: How long were we compromised?
[Jack] Three minutes and 45 seconds. Running a system check now.
We need to know what they accessed. Is the Locker safe?
translation.de: Worauf griffen sie zu? Ist der Tresor sicher?

translation.en: The Locker is still flying high with the Heart safe inside, 85,000 feet up.
translation.de: Der Tresor mit dem Herz ist immer noch sicher in 25 km Höhe.

translation.en: No one's getting up there without a space shuttle. It's passing over the Atlantic, towards West Africa.
translation.de: Da kommt nur ein Space Shuttle hin. Er fliegt in Richtung Westafrika.

translation.en: And the other suits, can they still access the Heart?
-Looks like it-- Jesus. -What?
There've been 100,000 attempts to access files.
Clubs team are analyzing the data, but looks like our security held.
translation.de: Aber unser Schutz hat wohl standgehalten.

translation.en: We need to shut it all down now.
-Shut what down? The Heart? -Until we know what they've done.
translation.de: -Was? Das Herz? -Bis wir wissen, was sie getan haben.

translation.en: We have no idea what they're capable of.
translation.de: Wir wissen nicht, was sie können.

translation.en: Don't need to shut it down to find out what they've done.
translation.de: Dazu müssen wir es nicht runterfahren.

translation.en: -We'd be harming ourselves. -We don't know. She's not stupid.
translation.de: -So schaden wir uns. -Sie ist nicht dumm.

translation.en: -And neither are we. -Sure about that? Because right now--
Rachel. Rachel. He's right. We'll sort it.
translation.de: Rachel, er hat recht. Wir regeln das.

translation.en: "We"?
A word in private. Now.
translation.de: Wir müssen unter vier Augen reden.

translation.en: I told you. I knew Keya was playing us, playing the Heart.
translation.de: Ich wusste, dass Keya uns, das Herz, täuscht.

translation.en: No, you didn't. No, you didn't You had a feeling.
translation.de: Nein. Du hattest nur ein Gefühl.

translation.en: Nothing… nothing concrete, nothing actionable.
A mood, a notion, a hunch, a bollocks. We don't trade in those.
translation.de: Eine Idee, eine Ahnung. Das ist uns zu wenig.

translation.en: I knew she wouldn't be there. You ignored the Heart, and you went back in.
translation.de: -Ich wusste, sie würde weg sein. -Du handeltest gegen das Herz.

translation.en: -To save my team. -They weren't your team. They died anyway. You going back made sure of that.
translation.de: -Um mein Team zu retten. -Du hast für ihren Tod gesorgt.

translation.en: You blew your cover.
If you'd left when we told you to, Parker would've followed you,
translation.de: Du hättest gehen sollen, dann hätten wir Parker geschnappt,

translation.en: we'd have caught him, and Yang and Bailey might be alive.
translation.de: Du hättest gehen sollen, dann hätten wir Parker geschnappt, und Yang und Bailey würden leben.

translation.en: -I should've just listened to the Heart? -Yes.
translation.de: -Ich hätte nur auf das Herz hören sollen? -Ja.

translation.en: The Charter exists for one reason.
translation.de: Die Charta existiert aus einem Grund.

translation.en: To maximize lives saved. That's the only moral metric there is.
translation.de: Nur um möglichst viele Leben zu retten,

translation.en: And it's a calculation. A pure and objective calculation.
translation.de: basierend auf reinen und objektiven Berechnungen.

translation.en: Made for us by a machine.
Have you forgotten how radical that is?
translation.de: Hast du vergessen, wie radikal das ist?

translation.en: It doesn't mean that what we do is easy or feels nice.
translation.de: Das macht unsere Arbeit nicht leicht und angenehm.

translation.en: You'll have the voices of those people in your head for the rest of your life.
translation.de: Du wirst dein Leben lang an diese Menschen denken.

translation.en: And you will never not feel responsible for them ever.
translation.de: Und du wirst dich immer für sie verantwortlich fühlen.

translation.en: But the end justifies the means.
translation.de: Aber der Zweck heiligt die Mittel.

translation.en: I spent every day with Parker for a year and didn't see it coming.
translation.de: Ich verbrachte ein Jahr täglich mit Parker und ahnte nichts.

translation.en: No.
Neither did the Heart.
So, what do we do now?
[groans] I'm…
Gonna make some tough choices, and this is the first one.
translation.de: Ich muss schwere Entscheidungen treffen. Die erste ist:

translation.en: I'm standing you down, Rachel.
Go home. Get some rest. Keep your head down. Don't do anything stupid.
translation.de: Geh nach Hause. Ruh dich aus. Bleib unauffällig.

translation.en: You can't do this. You're compromised.
Parker knows you. Dhawan knows you.
And the other Kings, quite rightly… don't know if you can be trusted.
translation.de: Und die anderen Könige vertrauen dir nicht mehr ganz.

translation.en: And you?
I want to protect what we've spent 20 years trying to build.
translation.de: Ich beschütze, was wir 20 Jahre lang aufgebaut haben.

translation.en: So, I'm just out.
It's about the greater good.
It's nothing personal.
No.
I'm starting to see that.
[man] Hello? -Stone? Wrong number. Wait. -It's for me.
translation.de: -Hallo? Stone? Falsch verbunden. -Das ist für mich.

translation.en: [man] That's my phone. I--
[Keya] So, why is a Charter agent riding around all alone, just hours after being poisoned?
translation.de: Warum fährt eine Charta-Agentin kurz nach einer Vergiftung allein herum?

translation.en: Doesn't feel like they're taking care of their most valuable player.
translation.de: Sie kümmern sich nicht um ihr wertvollstes Pferd.

translation.en: What do you want? [Keya] Don't be a sore loser.
I bet you used to think we were so alike. Now you know I'm better.
translation.de: Du dachtest wohl, wir seien uns ähnlich. Aber ich bin besser.

translation.en: Better? You killed my friends.
translation.de: Besser? Du hast meine Freunde getötet.

translation.en: What? [Stone] You didn't know, huh?
Well, I told you this wasn't a game, Keya.
translation.de: Ich sagte dir, das ist kein Spiel.

translation.en: Heart or no Heart,
I'm coming for you.
-Morning, ma'am. -Morning.
[man] Nomad. Great spot.
All four kings in the same room. How long has it been, three years?
translation.de: Alle vier Könige im selben Raum. Wie lange ist das her? Drei Jahre?

translation.en: Not long enough.
So, who is this Parker, and how did we miss him?
translation.de: So, wer ist dieser Parker, und wie konnten wir ihn übersehen?

translation.en: Career intelligence agent. Born in Belfast, lives alone.
translation.de: Erfolgreicher Geheimagent. Geboren in Belfast, lebt allein.

translation.en: He has no one he cares for. There's nothing much to live for.
translation.de: Er hat niemanden und nichts, wofür es sich zu leben lohnt.

translation.en: He has devoted his life to a country that sees him as expendable.
translation.de: Er hat sein Leben einem Land gewidmet, das ihn für entbehrlich hält.

translation.en: Okay. We get it. All that is fuel for the fire.
translation.de: Gut, schon klar, das ist Benzin fürs Feuer,

translation.en: -But it won't burn without a spark. -[woman] I was getting to that.
translation.de: aber ohne Funken brennt es nicht. Dazu komme ich jetzt.

translation.en: I had to lean extremely hard on some very old friends for this.
translation.de: Dafür musste ich sehr alte Freunde sehr unter Druck setzen.

translation.en: Chechnya, December 2015.
What's this?
It was before your time. Before the Heart, for that matter.
translation.de: Es war vor deiner Zeit. Sogar bevor es das Herz gab.

translation.en: A Chechen warlord was given free rein by the Chechen and Russian governments.
translation.de: Ein tschetschenischer Warlord bekam von Tschetschenien und Russland freie Hand.

translation.en: The West, as always, were looking the other way.
translation.de: Der Westen schaute wie immer weg.

translation.en: He was wiping out whole villages, trying to stamp out dissent.
translation.de: Er löschte ganze Dörfer aus, um Abweichler auszurotten.

translation.en: But… what's this got to do with Parker?
translation.de: Aber was hat das mit Parker zu tun?

translation.en: He was there.
Different identity. No electronic records.
But he was there, with MI6,
translation.de: Aber er war dort, mit dem MI6,

translation.en: delivering weapons to take the warlord out.
translation.de: und lieferte Waffen, um den Warlord auszuschalten.

translation.en: [man] Any sign of them?
You got an ETA yet? They'll be here.
[woman] We intercepted a communication.
It was a trap.
[King] Intelligence came through from MI6 that their entire team had been executed.
translation.de: Vom MI6 kam die Info, dass ihr gesamtes Team hingerichtet wurde.

translation.en: We thought there was no one left to save.
translation.de: Wir dachten, es gäbe niemanden zu retten.

translation.en: The region was a tinderbox on the verge of full civil war.
translation.de: Die Region war ein Pulverfass am Rande eines Bürgerkriegs.

translation.en: We couldn't let those weapons fall into the warlord's hands.
translation.de: Der Warlord durfte die Waffen nicht bekommen.

translation.en: It would have cost thousands of lives.
We had a drone that was stationed overhead armed with missiles.
translation.de: Wir hatten in der Luft eine Drohne, die mit Raketen ausgestattet war.

translation.en: I gave the order myself.
We made it look like a rebel force had ordered the drone strike.
translation.de: Wir ließen es wie einen Rebellenangriff aussehen.

translation.en: MI6 buried their mistake.
No report, no investigation.
No record of the personnel who had been involved.
translation.de: Keine Aufzeichnungen über das beteiligte Personal.

translation.en: We thought everyone had died.
Until a few hours ago.
What a mess.
So, you think… he knows it was us?
translation.de: Du denkst also, er weiß, dass wir es waren?

translation.en: I think that's a safe assumption.
And now he wants to destroy the Charter.
translation.de: Und jetzt will er die Charta zerstören.

translation.en: You killed Bailey and Yang? That wasn't the plan.
translation.de: Du hast Bailey und Yang getötet? Das war nicht der Plan.

translation.en: You stick to the tech and leave strategy to me, okay?
translation.de: Du kümmerst dich um die Technik, ich um die Strategie.

translation.en: Let me remind you, we're partners. Okay? So if you want me to do my job,
translation.de: Denk dran, wir sind Partner. Wenn ich meinen Job machen soll, sag mir immer, was du vorhast.

translation.en: you have to tell me what you're doing before you do it.
translation.de: Wenn ich meinen Job machen soll, sag mir immer, was du vorhast.

translation.en: Let me remind you, the Charter don't give two shits about people like Bailey and Yang.
translation.de: Die Charta schert sich nicht um Leute wie Bailey und Yang.

translation.en: So, if you want us to succeed, you shouldn't either.
translation.de: Das solltest du auch nicht, wenn wir Erfolg haben sollen.

translation.en: [Stone] Hey, Barry.
I'm a friend of your dad's.
translation.de: Ich bin eine Freundin deines Herrchens.

translation.en: It's okay.
[whispers] I've got you.
The camera.
She hacked into the camera feed.
Let's see how well she covered her tracks.
translation.de: Mal sehen, wie gut sie ihre Spuren verwischt hat.

translation.en: There she is.
What's in the desert, Keya?
translation.de: Was ist in der Wüste, Keya?

translation.en: I'm guessing it's not the nightlife.
Are you shitting me?
West Africa. The Locker.
[Parker] You ever done this before? Choppered in at over 40,000 feet?
translation.de: Bist du schon mal in 12.000 m Höhe Hubschrauber geflogen?

translation.en: Trick question. No one has.
But my mama always said I could do anything.
translation.de: Aber meine Mama sagte immer, ich schaffe alles.

translation.en: How long do we have before the Locker descends? Eleven hours and seven minutes.
translation.de: -Wie lange, bis sich der Tresor senkt? -11 Stunden und 7 Minuten.

translation.en: At which point, the Charter will realize what's going on.
translation.de: Dann wird die Charta merken, was los ist.

translation.en: It'll take nine minutes and 26 seconds for the Locker to drop to 40,000 feet.
translation.de: Es wird 9:26 Minuten dauern, bis der Tresor auf 12.000 m sinkt.

translation.en: We'll have about eight minutes to get in, take the Heart,
translation.de: Dann haben wir 8 Minuten, um das Herz zu holen

translation.en: and get out again before they regain control.
Very precise.
You're sure?
No. I'll be sure when it descends.
translation.de: Nein. Erst, wenn er sich senkt.

translation.en: If they found my code, it won't descend, they'll be waiting for us, and we all die.
translation.de: Wenn sie vorher meinen Code finden, werden wir alle sterben.

translation.en: -Hey. -Good morning.
What time is it?
Uh, it's nearly seven.
What? Oh shit.
[Ivo] Any luck?
Uh… nothing. But they need to pop their heads up at some point.
translation.de: Nein, aber irgendwann müssen sie sich zeigen.

translation.en: -I'll see if they-- -[alarm blaring]
Oh no, no, no, no, no.
Get Nomad now! Get Nomad now!
Just get me up there. I'll do the rest.
translation.de: Bring mich einfach hoch. Ich erledige den Rest.

translation.en: Nomad will string me up for this. Tell her I stole your keys.
translation.de: -Nomad bringt mich um. -Sag, ich hätte deine Schlüssel geklaut.

translation.en: You'll just have to trust me.
[Keya] Okay. Moment of truth.
How will we know if it's worked?
translation.de: Wie sehen wir, ob's geklappt hat?

translation.en: Would you look at that?
The Locker has been dropped 15,000 feet in the last two minutes.
translation.de: Der Tresor ist in 2 Minuten um 4.500 m gesunken.

translation.en: Still descending.
Security systems are all down. I'm locked out.
-How is that even possible? Another hack? -No. No.
translation.de: Wie ist das möglich? Noch ein Hack? Nein. Deshalb haben sie es das erste Mal getan.

translation.en: This is why they did it the first time.
translation.de: Nein. Deshalb haben sie es das erste Mal getan.

translation.en: It's been lying dormant in our system until now.
-Can you override it? -I'm trying.
[Ivo] The air lock's been breached. Contact every Charter agent in the region.
There's no one within 500 miles.
translation.de: Im Umkreis von 800 km ist keiner.

translation.en: [pilot] Approaching coordinates in five, four, three--
translation.de: Wir nähern uns den Koordinaten in fünf, vier, drei…

translation.en: -I hope you know what you're doing. -[Stone] Tell me about it.
translation.de: -Ich hoffe, du weißt, was du tust. -Ich auch.

translation.en: -We have a something approaching fast. -[Nomad] A something?
translation.de: Ein Etwas nähert sich schnell. Ein Etwas?

translation.en: -[Jack] Thirty seconds out. -What is it?
I think-- I think it's a someone.
translation.de: Ich glaube, es ist ein Jemand.

translation.en: Who is it?
Go in closer.
Is that--?
It's Stone.
I have to descend. Lower the rotor speed.
[Parker] Copy that. See you in seven minutes.
[Nomad] She's not gonna make it.
Look who it is.
-I'm gonna need a minute. -No!
The ship's lining is filled with hydrogen. One spark, and we're all dead.
translation.de: Das Schiff ist voller Wasserstoff. Ein Funke tötet uns.

translation.en: No way to get hold of her.
Come on, Rachel.
Come on.
It's over, Keya.
For who?
I told you not to get out of the van.
You also told me to have some fun.
translation.de: Und du sagtest, ich soll Spaß haben.

translation.en: It's gone.
And now you answer to me.
We've lost the Heart.
Not yet.
Parker. Ninety seconds. Let's go.
[Parker] Shame about your parachute. You'll be needing that.
translation.de: Schade um den Fallschirm. Du wirst ihn brauchen.

translation.en: -[Stone grunts] -[Keya] Get off me!
No, no, no, no, no! [screams]
-Get after them. -Impossible.
-We'll be lucky to get to base as it is. -[grunts]
translation.de: Unmöglich. Mit Glück erreichen wir die Basis.

translation.en: Get away!
Leave me alone!
Morning, sunshine.
Give me that thing before somebody gets--
I don't think so.
So, here's what's gonna happen.
You're gonna secret-agent our way back to civilization,
translation.de: Du führst uns als Geheimagentin in die Zivilisation,

translation.en: and I'm gonna follow three steps behind you with this gun.
translation.de: und ich folge dir mit dieser Waffe.

translation.en: -Where's the Heart? -Parker has it.
But I encrypted it to my biometrics, so it's useless without me.
translation.de: Aber ohne meine biometrischen Daten ist es nutzlos.

translation.en: Come on, get up.
If I shoot you now, all this is over.
translation.de: Erschieße ich dich, ist alles vorbei.

translation.en: Show you the same mercy you showed Bailey and Yang.
translation.de: Du hattest auch keine Gnade mit Bailey und Yang.

translation.en: It's the logical play, Rachel.
It's what the Heart would tell you to do.
translation.de: Das würde dir das Herz sagen.

translation.en: I'm not like you.
On your feet.
We need to keep moving.
So, what's the plan, Keya?
Trying to get even with Niam Kharche for kicking you out of the penthouse?
translation.de: Rache an Niam Kharche, weil er dich aus dem Penthouse warf?

translation.en: Right. You think you know everything.
translation.de: Genau. Du denkst, du weißt alles.

translation.en: I bet the Heart told you that he adopted me,
translation.de: Das Herz hat dir sicher gesagt, dass er mich adoptiert hat,

translation.en: lifted me out of nothing. But did it tell you why?
translation.de: Das Herz hat dir sicher gesagt, dass er mich adoptiert hat, aber auch, warum?

translation.en: Kharche used my parents like lab rats in a medical trial, and it killed them.
translation.de: Kharche hat meine Eltern durch medizinische Experimente getötet.

translation.en: He covered everything up and took me in thinking he was doing me a favor,
translation.de: Er vertuschte die Sache und nahm mich auf.

translation.en: but I let him think that because I knew one day,
translation.de: Ich spielte mit, denn ich wusste,

translation.en: I'd be strong enough to make him pay for what he did to my parents.
translation.de: ich würde irgendwann stark genug sein, um mich zu rächen.

translation.en: So, you get to tear the whole world down?
translation.de: Und die ganze Welt zu zerstören?

translation.en: Oh, this is not just for me. It's for people like me.
translation.de: Das ist nicht nur für mich. Es ist für Leute wie mich.

translation.en: Parker's gonna destroy the Charter.
I've got my whole naughty list, and we're going to expose them all.
translation.de: Und ich entlarve alle auf meiner Liste.

translation.en: With no thought of what comes next.
translation.de: Ohne an die Konsequenzen zu denken.

translation.en: You're a child.
And you think the Charter's any better?
Just because they saved you doesn't make them good.
translation.de: Da sie dich gerettet haben, sind sie nicht gut.

translation.en: You think I didn't look into you?
How many schools did you get kicked out of?
translation.de: Von wie vielen Schulen bist du geflogen?

translation.en: Seven? Eight?
Always a rebel. Always a problem.
translation.de: Immer eine Rebellin und ein Problem.

translation.en: Violent, alone, helpless.
-Stop. -Until the Charter comes along, right? And gives you that discipline that you so clearly crave.
translation.de: Und dann gab dir die Charta die Disziplin, die du gesucht hast.

translation.en: But did they take you in because you were good?
translation.de: Nahmen sie dich, weil du gut warst?

translation.en: -Or because you were broken? -Enough.
Maybe I was broken.
But there's a woman I know only as Nomad.
translation.de: Aber diese Frau, die ich nur als Nomad kenne,

translation.en: She rescued me, trained me,
showed me what's possible when there's someone watching your back.
translation.de: mir gezeigt, was möglich ist, wenn jemand auf dich aufpasst.

translation.en: Where is she now?
Let's go.
Parker's coming for you, and I wanna have a bigger gun when he shows up.
translation.de: Wenn Parker dich holt, will ich eine größere Knarre haben.

translation.en: They're headed for us.
Maybe it's Parker.
It's definitely not the Charter.
[Stone] Mercenaries?
Okay, let's just, um, give them a good cover story.
translation.de: Erzählen wir ihnen eine glaubwürdige Geschichte.

translation.en: They'll keep us alive for ransom. We reel them in, and then bam.
translation.de: Sie lassen uns wegen Lösegeld leben. Und dann macht es bam.

translation.en: Just to be clear, the "bam" is for you to take them out.
Yeah, I get that.
[woman in French] Who are you? And what the hell are you doing out here?
translation.de: Wer sind Sie? Und was tun Sie hier draußen?

translation.en: Need a ride?
You're an angel.
[in English] You know, the Charter can take down Kharche.
Parker's way isn't the only way.
translation.de: Parkers Weg ist nicht der einzige.

translation.en: [in French] How can we repay you?
You already have.
[in English] Come with me.
She got away.
That wasn't the deal.
Killing her wasn't the deal either. You have to pay me now.
translation.de: Sie zu töten auch nicht. Du musst mich jetzt bezahlen.

translation.en: The deal changed.
You're a hard woman to find.
Six of Hearts.
Nomad sends her best.
Dhawan is back with Parker. I slipped her a tracker.
translation.de: Dhawan ist mit Parker zurück. Ich hab ihr einen Tracker untergejubelt. Sie fliegen nach Norden.

translation.en: They're heading north. Looping you in now.
translation.de: Ich hab ihr einen Tracker untergejubelt. Sie fliegen nach Norden.

translation.en: [Nomad] Hi, Rachel.
Nice to hear your voice. I was a bit worried about you.
translation.de: Schön deine Stimme zu hören. Ich war etwas in Sorge.

translation.en: Were you?
Okay, got her. They're heading towards Iceland.
translation.de: Ok, ich hab sie. Sie steuern auf Island zu.

translation.en: I take it I'm no longer compromised.
translation.de: Ich bin wohl nicht mehr exponiert.

translation.en: Well, they have the Heart, so we're all compromised.
translation.de: Sie haben das Herz. Das sind wir alle.

translation.en: Parker's coming after the Charter, so we're heading to a secure location.
translation.de: Parker will die Charta, wir fahren an einen sicheren Ort.

translation.en: Clubs is assembling a team. We'll make sure they're on the ground by the time you arrive.
translation.de: Kreuz stellt ein Team zusammen. das wird dich vor Ort erwarten.

translation.en: And if we're too late? Just get there as fast as you can.
translation.de: -Und wenn wir zu spät sind? -Beeil dich einfach.

translation.en: If they get the Heart online, God knows what they're capable of.
translation.de: Weiß Gott, was sie tun, wenn sie das Herz online kriegen.

translation.en: I'm on my way.
It's not impregnable, but it's the best we've got.
translation.de: Es ist nicht uneinnehmbar, aber die beste Option.

translation.en: If the Heart wants to find us, it will.
translation.de: Wenn das Herz es will, findet es uns.

translation.en: [Stone] Will this hunk of junk make it to Iceland? Hell yeah.
translation.de: -Schafft es das Schrottding nach Island? -Oh ja.

translation.en: Nice trick you pulled with the facial recognition yesterday. Trying to put a lock on our new toy.
translation.de: Netter Trick mit der Gesichtserkennung. Eine Sperre für unser neues Spielzeug.

translation.en: Would you come back for me if I hadn't?
We're a team, Keya.
Don't do it again.
I think I have it.
I know where they're going. Reykjavik University computer lab.
translation.de: Sie wollen in den IT-Bereich der Universität Reykjavik.

translation.en: It has a cryo-storage facility, several floors of servers.
translation.de: Er hat ein Kryolager, mehrere Etagen voller Server.

translation.en: The tracker's heading straight for it.
See, Keya, don't say I don't keep my promises.
translation.de: Siehst du, Keya, ich halte meine Versprechen.

translation.en: Okay, be ready. You know your instructions.
translation.de: Ok, seid bereit. Ihr kennt die Anweisungen.

translation.en: Couple of minutes, we'll be up and running.
translation.de: In ein paar Minuten sind wir online.

translation.en: Are we up?
We're up.
Is this your naughty list?
Emails, texts, bank accounts. The Heart's using my algorithm to sort through it all.
translation.de: E-Mails, SMS, Bankkonten. Das Herz sucht mit meinem Algorithmus.

translation.en: So, we can find anyone? Gain access to anything?
translation.de: Wir können jeden finden? Auf alles zugreifen?

translation.en: Greatest skeleton key in the world.
Show me.
[Keya] There it is.
Evidence of Kharche's years of experiments on innocents across the country.
translation.de: Beweise für Kharches jahrelange Experimente an Unschuldigen.

translation.en: That's the truth… for the world to see.
translation.de: Das ist die Wahrheit, die die Welt sehen muss.

translation.en: That's impressive. But let's see what else this thing can do.
translation.de: Beeindruckend. Mal sehen, was das Ding noch kann.

translation.en: Find me the Kings.
What are you doing?
[woman] Nancy Morrison. King of Diamonds. Ex-CIA.
The Heart tells us she's heading to a safe house with her family.
translation.de: Ist mit Familie auf dem Weg in einen Unterschlupf.

translation.en: Drop the lift.
Are you serious?
No. Do--
You're welcome.
[man] Hang on. I have another one.
I think you're gonna like this, boss.
An unidentified military plane landed at a private airfield 33 minutes ago.
translation.de: Ein Militärflugzeug landete vor 33 Minuten auf einem Privatflugplatz.

translation.en: There.
Jiang Hsu. Served 35 years in Chinese State Security Service.
translation.de: Jiang Hsu. War 35 Jahre beim chinesischen Staatssicherheitsdienst.

translation.en: The King of Clubs is here in Iceland.
Even better. Where is he now?
translation.de: Noch besser. Wo ist er jetzt?

translation.en: Two minutes out.
Sending the plans now. Stone is on her way.
translation.de: Ich schicke die Pläne. Stone ist unterwegs.

translation.en: We don't have time to wait. Tell her to follow us in.
translation.de: Wir können nicht warten. Sie soll uns folgen.

translation.en: Any news of Spades or Hearts?
translation.de: Was Neues zu Pik oder Herz?

translation.en: [man] Nothing yet.
There were other people in that elevator. In that lobby.
translation.de: Da waren noch andere Leute im Aufzug. In der Lobby.

translation.en: Calm down, Keya.
You said we were going to expose Kharche and then the Charter, not murder them.
translation.de: Wir sollten Kharche und die Charta entlarven, nicht ermorden.

translation.en: The King of Hearts with her team. They're in a bunker outside of London.
translation.de: Herz-König mit ihrem Team. Sie sind in einem Bunker bei London.

translation.en: Good.
Take them out.
[Clubs] We're approaching now.
-We'll see you on the other side. -You're going in with them?
I ordered the strike on Parker. It's only fair.
translation.de: Ich ordnete den Angriff auf Parker an. Es ist fair.

translation.en: You know… I would have made the same call in Chechnya.
translation.de: Ich hätte in Tschetschenien genauso entschieden.

translation.en: Thanks. The right--
I've lost contact.
The Heart's online.
No, no, no, no.
We're locked in.
[Jack] Oh God. They've shut off our ventilation system.
No, no, no, no.
Jack, how long we got?
At this rate, about an hour and we're out of oxygen.
translation.de: In etwa einer Stunde wird uns der Sauerstoff ausgehen.

translation.en: The Charter never worries about who gets in their way. Neither will we.
translation.de: Die Charta ist rücksichtslos, also sind wir es auch.

translation.en: [woman] King of Hearts is locked in. They'll be dead in an hour.
translation.de: In einer Stunde sind sie tot.

translation.en: -You have to stop this, please. -Someone has to control this power, Keya.
translation.de: -Halt das bitte auf. -Jemand muss diese Macht kontrollieren.

translation.en: -Why not us? -This is not what we agreed.
You're still not seeing the bigger picture.
translation.de: Du siehst nicht das große Ganze.

translation.en: This isn't about some pissy little grievance you had with the bad man who killed your mom and dad.
translation.de: Es geht hier nicht um deinen Groll gegen den Mörder deiner Eltern.

translation.en: This is about power.
Concentrated in the hands of the few, of the very few who could use it for good,
translation.de: Konzentriert in den Händen der Wenigen, die damit Gutes bewirken könnten,

translation.en: who could actually make a change, but they don't.
translation.de: die etwas ändern könnten, es aber nicht tun.

translation.en: At this moment, we are mining trillions of pieces of data.
translation.de: In diesem Moment fördern wir Billionen von Daten.

translation.en: In a matter of hours, I will be able to take down the remaining members of the Charter.
translation.de: In wenigen Stunden werde ich die restlichen Charta-Leute ausschalten.

translation.en: We've been used and manipulated our whole lives.
translation.de: Wir wurden unser Leben lang benutzt und manipuliert.

translation.en: Now it's time for us to take control.
[Clubs] Go.
[man] Clubs team are inside the university building.
What… are you doing?
You wanna know how great men get power, Keya?
translation.de: Weißt du, wie große Männer Macht erlangen?

translation.en: It's not because they earn it…
translation.de: Nicht, weil sie was dafür tun,

translation.en: or because they deserve it.
It is because when the moment comes,
translation.de: Sondern, weil sie sie im richtigen Moment

translation.en: they take it.
Stone is one minute out.
In position. We're all set.
[woman] She's approaching the university.
Stone, you need to get out now.
I don't have long.
I have a failsafe uploading. It will disable the Heart. They won't be able to access it without me.
translation.de: Mein Upload wird das Herz deaktivieren. Ohne mich haben sie keinen Zugang.

translation.en: I'm outside. But you already know that.
translation.de: Ich bin draußen. Aber das weißt du schon.

translation.en: No, you're not. It's a trap.
translation.de: Bist du nicht. Es ist eine Falle.

translation.en: I found your tracker.
The lab is a decoy. You need to get your team out now.
translation.de: Der IT-Bereich ist ein Köder. Hol dein Team raus.

translation.en: -Why should I believe you? -Because you were right.
translation.de: -Warum soll ich dir glauben? -Du hattest recht.

translation.en: Okay? You told me about Parker, and you were right about everything.
translation.de: Du hattest recht mit Parker und allem, Rachel.

translation.en: My parents would have never wanted this.
translation.de: Meine Eltern hätten das nie gewollt.

translation.en: Just please listen to me.
Get your team out of there right now.
-Tell me where you are. -[Keya] Okay.
I'm sending you my coordinates. I'll leave the back door open.
translation.de: Ich schicke dir meine Koordinaten und lasse die Hintertür offen.

translation.en: Shit.
[grunts] I'm Nine of Hearts. I need your radio.
[groans] Go.
This is Nine of Hearts. Get out of there. It's a trap.
translation.de: Hier ist Herz-Neun. Geht raus. Es ist eine Falle.

translation.en: Do you hear me? She found the tracker. Get out of there.
translation.de: Hört ihr? Sie fand den Tracker. Geht raus.

translation.en: Do you hear me?
Yeah… I hear you.
What's going on?
-Where is she? -[woman hesitates]
-[woman mumbles] -What has she done? -How long to fix it? -Oh.
translation.de: Was hat sie getan? Wie lange, um es zu beheben?

translation.en: I-- Could be minutes. Could be hours.
translation.de: Vielleicht Minuten. -Vielleicht Stunden. -Regle es, bis ich zurück bin.

translation.en: You have until I get back.
translation.de: -Vielleicht Stunden. -Regle es, bis ich zurück bin.

translation.en: [Jack] The door won't move.
[grunts] Damn it!
[Ivo] There must be an emergency override system.
We must have missed something.
Jack, is there any way we can get hold of Stone?
No. No comms. We're still offline.
translation.de: Nein, wir sind immer noch offline.

translation.en: Maybe-- Maybe try the landline.
[groans] Okay. Okay.
-[Nomad] Stone, thank God. Where are you? -Clubs are dead.
translation.de: -Stone, Gott sei Dank. Wo bist du? -Kreuz sind tot.

translation.en: University was a trap.
I have new intel.
A new location.
We've-- We've lost Clubs?
What new intel?
[Stone] Keya. She shut down the Heart.
translation.de: Keya. Sie hat das Herz deaktiviert.

translation.en: -How do you know she's not playing you? -I don't.
translation.de: -Woher weißt du, dass sie nicht lügt? -Ich weiß es nicht.

translation.en: [Nomad] We're gonna die in less than an hour.
translation.de: Wir sind in einer knappen Stunde tot.

translation.en: -They shut down our air supply. -What?
-She shut down our air supply. -[Stone] Parker did.
translation.de: -Sie hat unsere Luftzufuhr gekappt. -Es war Parker.

translation.en: I believe her, Nomad.
I'd be dead too if I hadn't listened to her.
I trust her, and you need to trust me.
translation.de: Ich vertraue ihr, vertrau du mir.

translation.en: Fifty minutes.
I can work with that.
I'll see you.
You too.
Sorry, I need your truck.
[Parker] I know you're in here, Keya.
translation.de: Ich weiß, du bist hier, Keya.

translation.en: You know, you still have a choice.
You can still be a part of this.
You're only delaying the inevitable.
-Would you like me to wait? -[Stone] Definitely no.
But thanks!
Come on, Keya.
[Nomad] Settle down now.
Conserve air.
-Move. -[panting]
Get the Heart back online.
Do it!
Get up.
Get up!
[Parker] Right. Where do we start?
Fingers?
No, we'll be needing those. Knees?
translation.de: Nein, die brauchen wir noch. Knie?

translation.en: -[Keya screams] -Yeah.
Last chance.
[inhales] Okay, I'll do it.
Go on.
I need to get back in there.
The Heart has to be disconnected and reconnected again to the servers.
translation.de: Ich muss das Herz von den Servern trennen und wieder verbinden.

translation.en: Any interference, the system automatically shuts down. You know that.
translation.de: Bei jeder Störung schaltet sich das System automatisch ab.

translation.en: [Parker] Move.
This doesn't end well for you, Stone. Take another step, and she's dead.
translation.de: Das wird für dich böse enden. Ein Schritt und sie ist tot.

translation.en: -I don't care. I'm here for you. -[Parker] Bullshit.
translation.de: Das ist mir egal. Ich will dich. Schwachsinn.

translation.en: You and I know that without this one,
translation.de: Wir beide wissen, ohne sie bleibt das Herz offline,

translation.en: the Heart stays down and everyone inside that bunker dies,
translation.de: Wir beide wissen, ohne sie bleibt das Herz offline, und alle im Bunker sterben.

translation.en: unless, of course, they're dead already.
translation.de: Es sei denn, sie sind schon tot.

translation.en: I have the Heart, and I have the Kings. That's a winning hand.
translation.de: Ich habe das Herz und die Könige. Ein Gewinnerblatt.

translation.en: Okay. I'll put it down.
Good girl. Now, kick it away.
translation.de: Braves Mädchen. Und jetzt tritt sie weg.

translation.en: Tell me this, though.
What's your point, hm?
And why do you have to kill them to make it?
translation.de: Und warum musst du alle dafür töten?

translation.en: I've served my entire life, Rachel, and none of it mattered.
translation.de: Ich habe mein Leben lang gedient, und alles war umsonst.

translation.en: The world is still in chaos.
translation.de: Die Welt ist noch im Chaos.

translation.en: The Heart has the power to change everything.
But the Charter are using it to keep things exactly as they are.
translation.de: Aber die Charta nutzt es, um alles so zu erhalten, wie es ist.

translation.en: You don't wanna change anything. You just wanna be the one in charge.
translation.de: Du willst nichts verändern. Du willst nur die Macht haben.

translation.en: First thing you did with all that power was kill people.
translation.de: Mit ihr hast du als Erstes Menschen getötet.

translation.en: [scoffs] The problem with men like you, Parker,
translation.de: Das Problem mit Männern wie dir, Parker?

translation.en: is that your power is only ever based on threats and violence.
translation.de: Deine Macht beruht immer nur auf Drohungen und Gewalt.

translation.en: And when you brutalize everyone around you, even your own team…
translation.de: Und wenn du alle um dich herum peinigst, sogar dein Team,

translation.en: you'll never have the one thing I know I always will.
translation.de: wirst du nie das haben, was ich immer haben werde.

translation.en: Yeah?
And what is that, Rachel?
Someone to watch my back.
Maybe in the next life. [chuckles]
See you when I get there. [exhales]
[Stone] Nomad, tell me you're okay.
translation.de: Nomad, sag mir, es geht euch gut.

translation.en: Is everyone still with us?
[groans] Yeah, yeah.
It's good to hear from you, Stone.
translation.de: Schön von dir zu hören, Stone.

translation.en: I knew I would.
What's this?
I don't know.
It's beautiful.
[girl] But what is it? Who's it from?
[Stone] Looking good.
I decided to embrace the cliché and use my time in jail to get ripped.
translation.de: Ich wollte Klischees entsprechen und im Knast muskulös werden.

translation.en: You've had worse goals.
So my lawyers tell me.
And you? Back with the Charter?
[inhales] Yeah, I'm back with the Charter.
translation.de: Ja, ich bin wieder bei der Charta.

translation.en: But on two conditions.
The Heart's an amazing tool.
But that's all it is.
If we only follow the odds, we'll never do anything in spite of the odds.
translation.de: Wenn wir nie unberechenbar sind, riskieren wir nie etwas.

translation.en: And what if the odds tell you to do nothing?
translation.de: Und wenn sie euch sagen, ihr sollt nichts tun?

translation.en: That's when they send me.
What's the second thing?
I liked my team, Keya.
I miss them.
I wanna surround myself with people who will change the world for good.
translation.de: Ich will Leute um mich herum, die die Welt zum Guten verändern.

translation.en: How we doing, Jack? [Jack] Good news and bad news.
The good news, I've scouted the square, and your plan just might work.
translation.de: Ich habe den Platz erkundet, dein Plan könnte aufgehen.

translation.en: The bad news--
[exhales] Uh, they were out of oat milk.
-[car door closes] -Jack.
What? You told me to blend in.
Did we get into the power grid?
Yeah. It wasn't that hard, because their password was "password."
translation.de: Ja, das war nicht schwer, denn ihr Passwort war "Passwort".

translation.en: Your coffee.
Thank you.
This is cold.
Um, you know we can still throw you in jail, right?
[Stone] Hey.
Stay in the van.
